https://tmrev.io/movie/759749-Antifa: Rise of the Black Flags 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sHzs55tgpiM4eAdxABMgnxcVT0s.jpg The true history of the anti-government extremist terrorist group's century of violence. Focusing on the group which has caused nationwide rioting and violence, The film – which undermines the mainstream media’s depiction of the group as “just an idea” – has already been censored by YouTube and Vimeo. Antifa: Rise of the Black Flags
